body.name: Signature Design by Ashley Bennox Dining Room Set, Includes Table, 4 18" Chairs & Bench, Brown
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Signature Design by Ashley Store

body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: DINING ROOM TABLE SET: Gather everyone around this table set–it seats 6 comfortably for beautiful and relaxed dinner time. With tasteful upholstery and sleek lines, you'll love its inviting luster
HANDSOMELY CRAFTED: Table is made of veneers, wood and engineered wood. Chairs and bench have a wood frame and are upholstered in vinyl
CONTEMPORARY STYLE: Dressed in savory brown, it's a warm hue that complements the clean and tapered profile. It's your destination for casual-cool style
6 PIECE SET: Includes table, 4 chairs and a bench. Table measures 36" W x 60" D x 30.25" H, each chair measures 17.75" W x 21.75" D x 38.25", and bench measures 38.25" W x 15.25" D x 19" H
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, tools and hardware included
body.description: Set the scene for ultra contemporary style with this dining room table set. Table’s rich, dark finish and clean, gently tapered profile is the epitome of great taste. Cutout-design chairs with upholstered seats and back supports are a cut above. Addition of upholstered bench incorporates a generous helping of casually cool flair. Whether your home is contemporary or modern, there’s a durable dining table set finish or material that’s perfect for your space. Whatever your specific tastes, we have a dining room set that combines the latest trends with technology to give you the very best for your home. With unmatched prices and quality, we’re your one-stop destination for furniture and home accents and decor, like throw pillows, blankets and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value. Easy Assembly
reviews.reviewText: Bought this table and chair set on a pre-Black Friday deal for a significant discount.The delivery guys brought the single case up to my 2nd floor apartment for me. The case is about 150 pounds and contains all the items.The chairs, bench, and table each have their own hardware kit, so it makes organizing this simple. The table took 10 minutes to assemble, 10 minutes per chair, and the bench took 5 minutes. I did not use the provided allen wrench.Tip- if you have a drill or impact gun, go to Harbor Freight or any other cheap tool retailer and buy a bit kit for $10. I used the bit from this kit to assemble everything.The finish amd quality of the set is as expected. No damage during shipping. Stable when fully assembled. The set looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost the table is nice . Delivery took about a week. Small scratch on the surface of the table which I didn’t even think it was worth a picture . Delivery process is out of the control of Signature Design By Ashley , but total responsibility of the mail carrier . It is a very heavy box which is good because the table has some weight into it , Feels very sturdy and can sit 5-6 people . I’d say it’s worth the price , I don’t know how long it will last , but I do hope at least a year and I’d say I get my moneys worth . Last thing would be to be patient while putting the legs together as you’re going to put 16 legs together and 5 cushions . Instructions are clear and simple to understand took me about an Hour and 30 minutes. ** quick tip - if you have an uneven chair remove the cushion and attempt to sit it flush and tighten back again. I thought they gave me uneven legs on one of them but it was my mistake when building I did not make sure it was leveled and sitting flush .*** Other than that for an affordable table designed by Ashley furniture it’s great 10/10!! I hope my review helps others and if you were to purchase one and have scratched or missing parts remember it’s out of the control of Ashley as this set ships out from Amazon . Everything already comes included in the box . Travel might create a few tears in the box which can end up dumping some parts it all depends on the way it’s handled as it travels . :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a deal!!
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice looking, sturdy dinning table. After looking more than two months, I finally decided to go with this model. Simple design, easy to clean, soft to sit, won't take a lot of room, 6 people can sit, easy to move around. I was hesitant to order because while ordering it said people return this item a lot of time. It came with a lot of packaging material, so there is no damage to the items. I was able to assemble it my self. It was nicely labeled everything. You don't need any special tool to assemble. Finally very good product for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product itself came in with a big chip on one edge of the dining table. I called in for a replacement. They sent me a new one BUT it was a nightmare returning the defective one. First, I called Amazon 3+ times for someone to pick up the return. I filled out the form for return pickup 3 times! The product was ready for return and packaged up, but no one came! They charged my card for the new one I had gotten. Let me tell you, $500 extra charged on your credit card is not a small amount. Thankfully, after going thru with Amazon CS, they refunded me my money (for the extra charges). During this, no one came to pick it up (in the span of 2 months). I moved to a new place with this baggage, planning to throw it out. It was becoming a burden. Lo and behold, after 6 months (yes, 6 months later!) I get an email that the furniture company FINALLY scheduled a pickup thru a third party. Thank god, I hadn’t thrown it out! It had been sitting in the garage in a box. I had to then call Amazon and verify and make sure the third party was authentic. It was a horrible experience. I won’t ever make a furniture purchase like this again from Amazon.Coming to the actual product which was in new condition, it was easy to assemble. However, you have to be careful with the chair legs. Very easy to split them apart. The table is decent size but chairs were slightly smaller than expected. I would recommend it for those with a small dining room. This dining set looks small in my dining room. I have to purchase a new set now. The quality if top notch and the dining set is definitely sturdy and beautiful. I recommend it. It did fit my apartment beautifully.
Easy to assemble. Beautiful set. Well shipped. Includes 4 chairs and a bench.
Just like the photos. The delivery company called the day before delivery to inform you of a time to deliver.Easy to assemble, and looks perfect.🖤💙

Table is exactly like what you see in the picture, we did receive incorrect chairs but Amazon credited us when we agreed to keep them instead of the ones we ordered. Table is nice, sturdy and fits our space well. It is a functional table. The bench is small for 2 adults to sit comfortably , however would work really well with 1 child and 1 adult or 2 children.
Merci recu a la date & satisfaite du produit!

reviews.reviewTitle: Chairs are wobbly, one chair has broken.
reviews.reviewText: The material of "leather " is nice. the wood looks nice.However one chair broke just by falling over lightly ( 3 yr old kid ) so were already down 1 chair less than 3 months in. There is also a couple noticeable scratches already that I will touch up with furniture marker. The back of the chairs collect dust and need wiping regularly. For that reason I give it 3 stars. Glad I bought it on sale!
